00025 #include "OgrePagingLandScapeSceneManager.h"

00027 namespace Ogre
00028 {
00029     PagingLandScapeSceneManagerFactory* PagingLandScapePlugin;
00030 
00031     extern "C" void _OgrePagingLandScapeExport dllStartPlugin(void)
00032     {
00033             // Create new scene manager  Factory
00034             PagingLandScapePlugin = new PagingLandScapeSceneManagerFactory();
00035 
00036             // Register  Factory
00037             Root::getSingleton().addSceneManagerFactory(PagingLandScapePlugin);
00038     }
00039 
00040     extern "C" void _OgrePagingLandScapeExport dllShutdownPlugin(void)
00041     {   
00042         Root::getSingleton().removeSceneManagerFactory(PagingLandScapePlugin);
00043     }
00044 
00045     extern "C" void _OgrePagingLandScapeExport dllStopPlugin(void)
00046     {
00047             delete PagingLandScapePlugin;
00048     }
00049 }
